semantic_issues: The Enrollment class is not associated with the Student and Course classes in a way that reflects the many-to-many relationship. It should have associations to both Student and Course.
The Enrollment class should include associations to Student and Course to represent the enrollment relationship.
pragmatic_issues: The diagram lacks clarity in representing the relationships between Student, Course, and Enrollment. It is not immediately clear how Enrollment connects to both entities.
recommendations: Add associations from the Enrollment class to both the Student and Course classes to clearly represent the many-to-many relationship.
Consider renaming the associations to be more descriptive, such as 'enrolls' from Student to Enrollment and 'includes' from Course to Enrollment.
Include multiplicity on the associations from Enrollment to Student and Course to indicate that each Enrollment is linked to one Student and one Course.
